Description:
Detects default lsass dump filename generated by SafetyKatz.

Author: Markus Neis
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - SafetyKatz Dump Indicator
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where filepath like '%\temp\debug.bin'
